name: 3D: The Deadly Dungeon of Doom (Demo Version)
name_original: 3D: The Deadly Dungeon of Doom (Demo Version)
description:
3D: The Deadly Dungeon of Doom is a third-person 3D platformer obstacle course dungeon game. This game is about a treasure hunter who must overcome many deathtraps and obstacles in order to retrieve ancient treasures that are buried beneath the Deadly Dungeon of Doom thousand years ago.

Controls:

WASD = Move

Space = Jump

ESC / Escape key = Unlock Cursor

Left Mouse Click = Shoot

Instructions

- Collect the key to proceed to the next level.

- Avoid all the traps and avoid falling into the lava.

- In case you are killed by the traps or fell into the lava, you will be transported back to the starting point of the current level.
